title: convert an integer to fips — integer_to_fips
code: integer_to_fips(50) #> [1] "00050" class(integer_to_fips(50)) #> [1] "character" nchar(integer_to_fips(50))==5 #> [1] TRUE integer_to_fips(sample(1:50000,5)) #> [1] "08733" "36724" "41912" "17763" "40987"   # integer to state fips sl = integer_to_state_fips(5) #> Error in integer_to_state_fips(5): object 'fips' not found sl #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'sl' not found sl == '05000' #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'sl' not found

title: American College of Radiology Lung Cancer Screening Registry (LCSR) dataset — src_acr_lung_cancer_screening_data
text: ACR Lung Cancer Screening Registry (LCSR) designed systematically audit quality interpretation screening lung CT exams. registry based ACR Lung Imaging Reporting Data System (Lung-RADS), product ACR Lung Cancer Screening Committee subgroup Lung-RADS. Lung-RADS system quality assurance tool designed standardize lung cancer screening CT reporting management recommendations, reduce confusion lung cancer screening CT interpretations facilitate outcome monitoring. ACR LCSR capture Lung-RADS recommendations monitor compare appropriate use Lung-RADS#'

what: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) dataset — src_brfss
title: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) dataset — src_brfss
text: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) nation’s premier system health-related telephone surveys collect state data U.S. residents regarding health-related risk behaviors, chronic health conditions, use preventive services. Established 1984 15 states, BRFSS now collects data 50 states well District Columbia three U.S. territories. BRFSS completes 400,000 adult interviews year, making largest continuously conducted health survey system world.

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
text: src_cdc_places_data() returns dataframe estimates CDC PLACES.

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
text: Data Source

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
text: level Character string desired geographic level. Available 'county', "tract", 'zcta'. Defaults 'county'. year year CDC PLACES estimates. Estimates available 2020 2023. Defaults 2023.

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
text: data frame (data.frame) containing data pulled CDC PLACES API.

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data
text: PLACES collaboration CDC, Robert Wood Johnson Foundation, CDC Foundation. PLACES provides health data small areas across country. allows local health departments jurisdictions, regardless population size rurality, better understand burden geographic distribution health measures areas assist planning public health interventions. PLACES provides model-based, population-level analysis community estimates health measures counties, places (incorporated census designated places), census tracts, ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) across United States.

title: CDC PLACES — src_cdc_places_data

text: data frame (data.frame) containing data pulled Envirofacts API.

title: FDA Certified Mammography Facilities Dataset — src_fda_mammography_data
text: Mammography Quality Standards Act requires mammography facilities across nation meet uniform quality standards. Congress passed law 1992 assure high-quality mammography early breast cancer detection, can lead early treatment, range treatment options, increased chances survival. law, mammography facilities must: 1) accredited FDA-approved accreditation body, 2) certified FDA, State, meeting standards, 3) undergo annual MQSA inspection, 4) prominently display certificate issued agency. facilities meeting criteria listed FDA Certified Mammography Facilities dataset

title: National Plan & Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) — src_nppes_gi_data
text: Centers Medicare & Medicaid Services CMS developed NPPES assign unique identifiers health care providers. National Provider Indentifier (NPI) standard identifier HIPAA-covered entities (health care providers) since May 23, 2007. Small health plans required obtain use NPI May 23, 2008.
